alert.note: Alert for Lower Yukon and Innoko Valleys (Alaska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Storm Warning issued December 22 at 2:20PM AKST until December 24 at 6:00AM AKST by NWS Fairbanks
info.description: ...WINTER STORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM MIDNIGHT TONIGHT TO 6 AM AKST SUNDAY... * WHAT...Heavy snow expected. Total snow accumulations of 8 to 12 inches. * WHERE...Lower Yukon and Innoko Valleys. * WHEN...From midnight tonight to 6 AM AKST Sunday. * IMPACTS...Travel could be very difficult to impossible. The cold wind chills as low as 35 below zero could cause frostbite on exposed skin in as little as 30 minutes. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Heavy snow is expected to develop late tonight and continue into Sunday. The heaviest snow is expected at Holy Cross with lower amounts to the north.
info.instruction: A Winter Storm Warning for snow means severe winter weather conditions are expected or occurring. This will make travel very difficult or impossible.
